stimulusHtml: For −5 ≤ x ≤ c, let g be the function defined by  g ( x ) = ∫ − 1 x f ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGNbWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqp daWdXaWdaeaapeGaamOzaaWcpaqaa8qacqGHsislcaaIXaaapaqaa8 qacaWG4baaniabgUIiYdGcdaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaa wMcaaiaadsgacaWG0baaaa@4550@ . Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of g. Justify your answer.

features.html: The function f is defined on the interval − 5 ≤ x ≤ c MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacqGHsislcaaI1aGaeyizImQaamiEaiabgsMiJkaadogaaaa@3D11@ , where c > 0 and f(c) = 0. The graph of f, which consists of three line segments and a quarter of a circle with center (-3, 0) and radius 2, is shown in the figure above.
